name: Kitchen Station Module
description: Create Kitchen Station Doctype and routing logic for item groups.

tasks.name: Define Kitchen Station Doctype
tasks.prompt: Create `Kitchen Station` Doctype with fields: `station_name`, `item_groups` (MultiSelect Table), `branch_code`, `printer_name`, `is_active`. Used to assign items to kitchen stations.

tasks.name: Map Item Groups to Station
tasks.prompt: Implement logic to route POS Order items to Kitchen Station based on item group. Use a method or hook to determine routing destination.
